ThingDef.label: Power Armor Assault Rifle
ThingDef.description: The Assault Rifle is a pre-war, fully automatic rifle chambered for 5.56mm rounds. Its distinctive drum magazine and robust construction make it a favorite for sustained fire in the wasteland, though it is heavy and unwieldy compared to more modern designs requiring the use of power armor.

ThingDef.label: Service Rifle
ThingDef.description: The Service Rifle is a semi-automatic rifle chambered for 5.56mm rounds. Originally issued to NCR troopers, it is a reliable and versatile weapon designed for medium-range combat.

ThingDef.label: R-91 Assault Rifle
ThingDef.description: The R-91 is a pre-war, fully automatic assault rifle chambered for 5.56mm rounds. It was the standard-issue rifle for the U.S. Armed Forces before the Great War, known for its reliability and versatility in combat.

ThingDef.label: Chinese Assault Rifle
ThingDef.description: A rugged and powerful assault rifle of Chinese origin. It was widely used by Chinese forces during the Sino-American War, known for its high damage output and reliability in harsh conditions.

ThingDef.label: Marksman Carbine
ThingDef.description: A lightweight, semi-automatic carbine chambered for 5.56mm rounds. Designed for precision and medium-range engagements, it was favored by NCR marksmen for its accuracy and reliability.

ThingDef.label: Assault Carbine
ThingDef.description: A compact, fully automatic carbine chambered for 5mm rounds. Designed for military use, it offers a high rate of fire and excellent handling, making it ideal for close-quarters combat and suppressive fire.

ThingDef.label: DKS-501 Sniper Rifle
ThingDef.description: The DKS-501 is a pre-war bolt-action sniper rifle chambered for .308 rounds. Known for its exceptional accuracy and stopping power, it is a favorite among marksmen for long-range engagements.

ThingDef.label: Scoped Hunting Rifle
ThingDef.description: The Scoped Hunting Rifle is a pre-war bolt-action rifle chambered for .308 rounds. Equipped with a scope, it is highly accurate and effective for medium to long-range engagements, making it a reliable choice for hunters and marksmen alike.

ThingDef.label: Combat Rifle
ThingDef.description: The standard combat rifle is a rugged, semi-automatic rifle chambered for .45 ACP rounds. Reliable and versatile, it is a favorite among wastelanders for its balance of firepower, accuracy, and durability.

ThingDef.label: BB Gun
ThingDef.description: A simple air-powered BB gun. While not lethal, it can sting and is often used for training or pest control. Not recommended for serious combat.

ThingDef.label: Brush Gun
ThingDef.description: The Brush Gun is a lever-action rifle chambered for .45-70 Government rounds. Favored for its high stopping power and reliability, it is a popular choice among wasteland hunters and marksmen for taking down large game and armored targets.

ThingDef.label: Cowboy Repeater
ThingDef.description: A classic lever-action rifle chambered for .357 rounds. The Cowboy Repeater is lightweight, reliable, and favored by marksmen and wanderers alike for its fast cycling and respectable accuracy.

ThingDef.label: Trail Carbine
ThingDef.description: The Trail Carbine is a lever-action rifle chambered for .44 Magnum rounds. Renowned for its ruggedness and accuracy, it is a favorite among wasteland scouts and hunters for its fast cycling and reliable stopping power.

ThingDef.label: .32 Hunting Rifle
ThingDef.description: The .32 Hunting Rifle is a pre-war bolt-action rifle chambered for .32 caliber rounds. Known for its simplicity and reliability, it is a common weapon among wastelanders, offering decent accuracy and stopping power for medium-range engagements.

ThingDef.label: Varmint Rifle
ThingDef.description: The Varmint Rifle is a lightweight, bolt-action rifle chambered for .223 rounds. Originally designed for pest control and small game hunting, it is accurate and easy to handle, but lacks the stopping power of larger rifles.

ThingDef.label: .223 Rangemaster Rifle
ThingDef.description: The .223 Rangemaster is a precision bolt-action rifle chambered for .223 rounds. Favored by marksmen for its high accuracy and range, it is a reliable choice for hunting and long-range engagements in the wasteland.

ThingDef.label: 10mm SMG
ThingDef.description: The 10mm SMG is a compact, fully automatic submachine gun chambered for 10mm rounds. Known for its high rate of fire and ease of use, it is ideal for close-quarters combat but sacrifices accuracy at longer ranges.

ThingDef.label: 9mm SMG
ThingDef.description: The 9mm SMG is a lightweight, fully automatic submachine gun chambered for 9mm rounds. Known for its ease of use and high rate of fire, it is effective in close-quarters combat but lacks stopping power and accuracy at longer ranges.

ThingDef.label: 12.7mm SMG
ThingDef.description: The 12.7mm SMG is a powerful, fully automatic submachine gun chambered for 12.7mm rounds. Known for its high damage output and rapid rate of fire, it is devastating in close-quarters combat but suffers from heavy recoil and limited accuracy at range.

ThingDef.label: Submachine Gun
ThingDef.description: The classic submachine gun chambered for .45 ACP rounds. Known for its stopping power and reliability, it is favored for close-quarters combat despite its heavy recoil.

ThingDef.label: Silenced .22 SMG
ThingDef.description: A lightweight, fully automatic submachine gun chambered for .22 LR rounds and equipped with an integral suppressor. Extremely quiet and easy to control, but lacks stopping power compared to larger calibers.

ThingDef.label: Caravan Shotgun
ThingDef.description: A double-barreled, break-action shotgun popular with caravan guards and traders. Its simple design makes it easy to repair and maintain, but it suffers from a slow reload and limited range

ThingDef.label: Hunting Shotgun
ThingDef.description: A pump-action shotgun designed for hunting game. Favored for its rugged construction, high capacity, and reliability in the harshest wasteland conditions.

ThingDef.label: Combat Shotgun
ThingDef.description: The Combat Shotgun is a semi-automatic, magazine-fed shotgun chambered for 12 gauge shells. Designed for military and law enforcement, it offers a high rate of fire and reliability in close-quarters combat, making it a favorite among wasteland enforcers.

ThingDef.label: Riot Shotgun
ThingDef.description: This pre-War, semi-automatic combat shotgun was designed for law enforcement and military use. Its high rate of fire and large magazine make it devastating in close-quarters combat.

ThingDef.label: Sawn-Off Shotgun
ThingDef.description: A double-barreled shotgun with the barrels and stock cut down for easier concealment. Extremely deadly at point-blank range, but wildly inaccurate and short-ranged.

ThingDef.label: Lever-Action Shotgun
ThingDef.description: A classic lever-action shotgun, prized for its fast cycling and reliability. Popular among ranchers and lawmen, it delivers solid stopping power and can be fired rapidly in skilled hands.

ThingDef.label: Single Shotgun
ThingDef.description: A simple, single-barrel break-action shotgun. Cheap to produce and easy to maintain, but slow to reload and limited to one shot at a time.

ThingDef.label: Minigun
ThingDef.description: The Minigun is a multi-barrel, rotary machine gun capable of firing 5mm rounds at an extremely high rate. Its devastating firepower makes it a favorite for heavy support roles, but its weight and bulk limit mobility.

ThingDef.label: Light Machine Gun
ThingDef.description: The Light Machine Gun is a pre-war, fully automatic support weapon chambered for 5.56mm rounds. Designed for sustained suppressive fire, it features a high-capacity magazine and a high rate of fire, making it ideal for pinning down enemies and providing covering fire in open combat.

ThingDef.label: 10mm Pistol
ThingDef.description: The 10mm Pistol is a semi-automatic sidearm chambered for 10mm rounds. Favored for its reliability and stopping power, it is a common sight among wastelanders and pre-war security forces alike.

ThingDef.label: Silenced 10mm Pistol
ThingDef.description: The Silenced 10mm Pistol is a semi-automatic sidearm chambered for 10mm rounds and fitted with an integral suppressor. Favored by assassins and covert operatives, it offers a balance of stopping power and stealth.

ThingDef.label: Chinese Pistol
ThingDef.description: The Chinese Pistol is a compact, semi-automatic sidearm chambered for 9mm rounds. Manufactured before the Great War, it is lightweight and easy to conceal, but suffers from low stopping power and questionable reliability.

ThingDef.label: 9mm Pistol
ThingDef.description: The 9mm Pistol is a lightweight, semi-automatic sidearm chambered for 9mm rounds. Its low recoil and plentiful ammunition make it a popular choice for both civilians and wastelanders, though it lacks the stopping power of larger calibers.

ThingDef.label: 5.56mm Pistol
ThingDef.description: The 5.56mm Pistol is a rare, high-powered sidearm chambered for 5.56mm rifle rounds. Its unique design offers superior penetration and range compared to typical pistols, but with increased recoil and wear.

ThingDef.label: 12.7mm Pistol
ThingDef.description: The 12.7mm Pistol is a heavy, semi-automatic sidearm chambered for 12.7mm rounds. Its immense stopping power and armor penetration make it a favorite among wasteland enforcers, but its weight and recoil require a strong hand.

ThingDef.label: Silenced .22 Pistol
ThingDef.description: The Silenced .22 Pistol is a lightweight, semi-automatic sidearm chambered for .22 LR rounds and equipped with an integral suppressor. Extremely quiet and easy to control, it is favored for stealth operations but lacks stopping power.

ThingDef.label: .32 Pistol
ThingDef.description: The .32 Pistol is a simple, six-shot revolver chambered for .32 caliber rounds. Commonly found throughout the wasteland, it is easy to maintain and use, but lacks the stopping power of larger handguns.

ThingDef.label: .357 Revolver
ThingDef.description: The .357 Revolver is a classic, six-shot sidearm chambered for .357 Magnum rounds. Renowned for its reliability and stopping power, it is a favored weapon among lawmen and gunslingers in the wasteland.

ThingDef.label: .44 Magnum Revolver
ThingDef.description: The .44 Magnum Revolver is a powerful, six-shot sidearm chambered for .44 Magnum rounds. Renowned for its high stopping power and intimidating presence, it is a prized weapon among wasteland hunters and enforcers.

ThingDef.label: Hunting Revolver
ThingDef.description: The Hunting Revolver is a large, single-action revolver chambered for .45-70 Government rounds. Designed for hunting big game, it delivers devastating power and accuracy, but its heavy frame and slow rate of fire make it unwieldy in close combat.
